page1.title: Welcome! We are Setlone
page1.description: We are the first platform that integrates investment, consumption, fintech, and culture

page2.title: On our platform
page2.description: You can discover various things through SUTmembers. SUTmembers operates as a membership system, and you can use crypto cards and receive benefits when you sign up.

page3.title: Shop and earn rewards
page3.description: Get points as rewards for your purchases! Discover various products in our shopping mall

page4.title: Share fun and diverse content
page4.description: Upload posts and short videos to get likes! Likes are rewarded with SUT every day at 00:00!

staking.title: Staking
staking.lockupDescription: Lock tokens for a fixed period to earn higher rewards
staking.unlockDescription: Flexible staking with withdrawal available at any time
staking.liquidityRiskNotice: Withdrawals may be delayed or fees may apply depending on liquidity conditions.
staking.lockupHeroTitle: Higher rewards when you commit to a period
staking.lockupHeroDescription: A staking product that deposits assets for a fixed period and receives stable rewards.
staking.lockupSummaryContent: Lockup Staking is a product that provides higher rewards than regular staking by committing not to withdraw assets for a certain period.
staking.lockupWarningContent: Asset withdrawal is not possible during the lockup period, and principal and rewards may not be paid in case of early termination.
staking.lockupRecommend1: Those who can lock funds for a certain period
staking.lockupRecommend2: Those who want higher returns than short-term liquidity
staking.lockupRecommend3: Those with clear long-term investment plans
staking.lockupRewardNotice: Rewards may vary depending on network conditions and platform operating policies, and fixed returns are not guaranteed.
staking.commonNotice: This staking product is not network native staking, but a product designed and operated by the platform itself. Principal and returns are not guaranteed and may vary depending on market conditions and operating policies.
staking.lockupButtonHint: Please check the lockup period and conditions before proceeding.
staking.unlockButtonHint: Please check withdrawal conditions and fee policy.
staking.unlockHeroTitle: Flexible staking with withdrawal available at any time
staking.unlockHeroDescription: You can freely manage your assets while earning rewards.
staking.unlockSummaryContent: Unlock Staking is a liquidity-focused staking product that allows withdrawals at any time without a separate lockup period.
staking.unlockRecommend1: Those who need to use funds at any time
staking.unlockRecommend2: Those who value short-term operation and liquidity
staking.unlockRecommend3: Those experiencing staking for the first time
staking.unlockRewardNotice: Reward rates are not fixed and may vary depending on liquidity pool conditions and market environment.
staking.unstakingInfoMessage: Unstaking requests are processed immediately, but actual withdrawal takes a certain period.
staking.unstakingInfoDetail: According to network rules, a certain period must pass after the unstaking request before withdrawal is possible. Rewards are settled up to the request time.
staking.loginRequired: Login is required to use staking features
staking.unstakingWarningMessage: After requesting unstaking, it may take up to 3 days to withdraw according to network rules. Rewards will be settled up to the request time.
staking.minStakingReason: According to network staking policy, minimum 100 SET is required.
staking.liquidStakingSubtitle: Earn staking rewards while utilizing derivative tokens to manage assets more efficiently.
staking.stakingDescription: Earn rewards through network native staking
staking.utilizationDescription: Additional operations such as trading, deposits, and collateral
staking.agreement1: I understand the structure of derivative tokens (LST)
staking.agreement2: I acknowledge LST price volatility and depegging risks
staking.agreement3: I confirm this product differs from native staking
staking.restakingSubtitle: An advanced staking method that allows you to participate in additional security services and receive additional rewards by utilizing already staked assets.
staking.restakingSummary: Restaking is an advanced staking method that connects assets already staked on the network to additional validation services (AVS) to receive additional rewards.
staking.existingStakingDescription: Assets already staked on the network
staking.restakingRiskNotice: Restaking is an advanced staking method that offers additional profit opportunities along with higher risks.
staking.restakingAgreement1: I understand that restaking is not native staking
staking.restakingAgreement2: I acknowledge that principal loss may occur due to additional slashing
staking.restakingAgreement3: I confirm that rewards are not fixed and may vary
staking.restakingAgreement4: I understand that this product is high-risk
staking.restakingRewardNotice: Restaking rewards are not fixed and may not be paid or may be suspended depending on the operating conditions of the participating service (AVS).
staking.cefiStakingSubtitle: Enjoy stable returns through safe and convenient staking on a centralized platform.
staking.cefiStakingSummary: CeFi (Centralized Finance) staking is a service where centralized financial platforms manage and stake users' cryptocurrencies on their behalf. Users can participate in staking through a simple interface without complex technical knowledge, as the platform handles all technical processes. Similar to traditional finance, a central institution manages assets, and users rely on the platform's reliability and security.
staking.easyAccessDescription: Simple participation without complex technical knowledge
staking.cefiAdvantage1: User Convenience: Can participate through a simple interface without complex technical knowledge
staking.cefiAdvantage2: Fast Withdrawal: Relatively fast withdrawal without unbonding period
staking.cefiAdvantage3: Stable Returns: Platform management provides relatively stable returns
staking.cefiAdvantage4: Low Entry Barrier: Low minimum amount and easy for beginners to start
staking.cefiRisk1: Platform Reliability Dependency: Completely dependent on platform reliability and security
staking.cefiRisk2: Centralization Risk: Single point of failure due to centralized structure
staking.cefiRisk3: Regulatory Change Possibility: Service restrictions possible due to regulatory changes in each country
staking.cefiRisk4: Platform Operation Suspension Possibility: Asset access restrictions possible if platform has issues
staking.cefiRisk5: Custody Risk: Assets are deposited with the platform, risk of loss in case of hacking
staking.cefiStakingRiskNotice: CeFi staking depends on the reliability and security of centralized platforms, so careful review is required when selecting a platform. Please check the platform's security record, regulatory compliance, and asset insurance status.
staking.cefiRecommend1: Crypto Beginners: Those who want to start staking simply without technical complexity
staking.cefiRecommend2: Liquidity Focused: Those who need flexibility to withdraw quickly at any time
staking.cefiRecommend3: Stable Return Seekers: Those who prefer stable returns over high returns
staking.cefiRewardNotice: CeFi staking rewards may vary according to platform policies and may be delayed or suspended depending on platform operating conditions. Reward rates may change according to market conditions and platform policies, so please refer to this.
staking.cefiCommonNotice: CeFi staking is provided through centralized platforms and has a different structure from native staking. Please fully understand the platform's terms of use and risks before participating. Principal loss is possible, and investment decisions are the user's own responsibility.
staking.defiStakingSubtitle: A staking method where users directly manage assets through smart contracts.
staking.defiStakingSummary: DeFi (Decentralized Finance) staking is a decentralized staking method where users directly manage assets through smart contracts. Without a centralized platform, users connect directly to smart contracts on blockchain networks to stake, and users control and are responsible for all processes. Assets are stored in the user's wallet and managed directly through smart contracts.
staking.walletConnectionDescription: Start by connecting a Web3 wallet
staking.tokenApprovalDescription: Grant token usage permission to smart contract
staking.smartContractDepositDescription: Directly deposit assets to smart contract
staking.rewardGenerationDescription: Rewards paid according to smart contract rules
staking.defiRisk1: Smart Contract Bug: Asset loss possible due to code errors
staking.defiRisk2: Hacking and Exploitation: Attack risk from exploiting security vulnerabilities
staking.defiRisk3: Reward Suspension: Reward payment may be suspended if protocol operation stops
staking.defiRisk4: Token Value Volatility: Asset value changes due to market volatility
staking.defiRisk5: Transaction Failure: Transaction failure and fee loss during network congestion
staking.defiStakingRiskNotice: DeFi staking is based on smart contracts, and all responsibility lies with the user. Please check the protocol's audit status, smart contract address, and official website before participating.
staking.defiRecommend1: Advanced Users: Those who understand smart contracts and blockchain
staking.defiRecommend2: Direct Control Preferrers: Those who want to manage and control assets directly
staking.defiRecommend3: Decentralization Seekers: Those who want decentralized services without centralized platforms
staking.defiRewardNotice: DeFi staking rewards vary according to smart contract rules and are not guaranteed. Rewards may vary or be suspended depending on protocol operation, market conditions, and network status.
staking.defiAgreement1: I understand that this staking is not a centralized service
staking.defiAgreement3: I confirm that rewards are not guaranteed
staking.defiAgreement4: I understand that transactions cannot be reversed
staking.defiCommonNotice: DeFi staking is provided through smart contracts and has a completely different structure from CeFi staking. All responsibility lies with the user, and principal loss is possible. Investment decisions are the user's own responsibility.
staking.risk4: Slashing risk (asset loss in case of validator misconduct)
staking.risk5: Protocol hacking and technical error possibilities
staking.liquidStakingRiskNotice: Liquid staking offers higher return opportunities than native staking, but carries the additional risks listed above. Please review carefully before investing.
staking.security1: LST may not maintain a 1:1 ratio with the original asset
staking.security2: Full asset loss possible due to smart contract bugs or hacking
staking.security3: Possibility of protocol operator authority abuse
staking.security4: Withdrawal delays possible if liquidity provider (LP) pools are depleted
staking.lstUtilizationGuide: LST can be utilized in these ways
staking.lstUtilizationNotice: LST utilization is done through separate services and external protocols.
staking.ctaHint: Proceeds after agreeing to derivative token issuance and risks.
staking.stakingExplanation: Staking is a way to earn rewards by holding cryptocurrency in your wallet and participating in the security and operation of a blockchain network. It's similar to earning interest from a bank deposit, but you're directly participating in a decentralized blockchain network.
staking.stakingBenefit1: Earn rewards while contributing to network security
staking.stakingBenefit4: Use as a long-term investment strategy

native.title: Native Staking
native.description: Stake tokens directly on the blockchain network

lockup.title: Lockup vs Unlock Staking
lockup.description: Choose between locked and flexible staking options

liquid.title: Liquid Staking (LST)
liquid.description: Stake while maintaining liquidity with liquid staking tokens

restaking.title: Restaking
restaking.description: Utilize already staked assets to receive additional rewards

cefi.title: CeFi Staking
cefi.description: Centralized finance staking through trusted platforms

defi.title: DeFi Staking
defi.description: Decentralized finance staking on DeFi protocols

native.title: Native Staking
native.content: Native Staking allows you to stake tokens directly on the blockchain network using the native protocol. You participate directly in network security and consensus, earning rewards by staking native tokens.
additionalInfo: Reward rates vary based on network conditions

lockup.title: Lockup vs Unlock Staking
lockup.content: Lockup Staking locks your tokens for a fixed period to earn higher rewards. Unlock Staking allows flexible withdrawal at any time, offering lower rewards but greater freedom in managing your assets.
additionalInfo: Lockup Staking: Lock tokens for a fixed period to earn higher APY
Unlock Staking: Withdraw anytime but with relatively lower APY
Reward rates vary based on network conditions
Unstaking is not available during the lockup period

liquid.title: Liquid Staking (LST)
liquid.content: Liquid Staking is an innovative way to earn rewards while maintaining liquidity of staked tokens. You receive Liquid Staking Tokens (LST) representing your staked tokens, which can be used in other DeFi protocols.

restaking.title: Restaking
restaking.content: Restaking allows you to stake already staked tokens again to earn additional rewards. You can stake across multiple protocols simultaneously to maximize returns.

cefi.title: CeFi Staking
cefi.content: CeFi (Centralized Finance) Staking provides staking services through trusted centralized platforms. It is user-friendly, stable, and offers professional management services.

defi.title: DeFi Staking
defi.content: DeFi (Decentralized Finance) Staking provides staking services through decentralized protocols. You interact directly with smart contracts without intermediaries, earning rewards in a transparent and open manner.

ethereum.title: Ethereum Node Participation
ethereum.description: Participate in Ethereum network nodes to earn rewards

bitcoin.title: Bitcoin
bitcoin.content: Bitcoin mining allows you to contribute to network security and earn rewards. You can generate stable income through professional mining equipment and pools.

ethereum.title: Ethereum Node Participation
ethereum.content: Participate in Ethereum network validation nodes to strengthen network security and earn rewards. You can generate passive income through staking.

coins.title: Mineable Coins
coins.content: Check the mining feasibility and profitability of various cryptocurrencies. We provide the latest mining information and market trends.

investment.title: Investment Game
investment.description: Investment and profit generation through games

casino.title: Online Casino
casino.content: We provide transparent and fair online casino games using blockchain technology. Smart contracts ensure the fairness of game results.

investment.title: Investment Game
investment.content: An innovative platform where you can generate investment returns while enjoying games. In-game activities are connected to real profits.

reward.title: Reward-based
reward.description: Crowdfunding where you receive rewards or products when the project succeeds

investment.title: Investment-based
investment.description: Crowdfunding where you invest in projects expecting returns

loan.title: Loan-based
loan.description: Crowdfunding where you lend to projects and receive interest

reward.title: Reward-based Crowdfunding
reward.content: A form of crowdfunding where you fund a project and receive promised rewards or products when the project succeeds. This is the typical model of product-based crowdfunding.

investment.title: Investment-based Crowdfunding
investment.content: A form of crowdfunding where you invest in a project expecting future returns. You can earn investment returns based on the project's success.

loan.title: Loan-based Crowdfunding
loan.content: A form of crowdfunding where you lend funds to a project and receive principal and interest after a set period. You can expect stable returns.

sellerket.title: Sellerket
sellerket.content: Sellerket is a global shopping mall platform where you can purchase various products from around the world in one place. We provide a safe and convenient shopping experience.

web3shopping.title: Web3 Shopping
web3shopping.content: An innovative shopping platform using Web3 technology. Instant payment is possible without SWIFT, and we provide secure transactions based on blockchain.

futures.title: Futures & Options
futures.description: AI-based futures and options auto trading

commodities.title: Gold, Commodities, etc.
commodities.description: AI-based gold and commodities auto trading

bonds.title: Bonds & Foreign Currency

crypto.title: Cryptocurrency
crypto.content: Automated cryptocurrency trading service using AI algorithms. Automatically captures optimal trading opportunities through real-time market data analysis and machine learning.

stocks.title: Foreign Stocks
stocks.content: AI-based automated foreign stock trading service. AI analyzes various opportunities in global stock markets and automatically makes investment decisions.

futures.title: Futures & Options
futures.content: AI-based automated futures and options trading service. AI manages risks and finds profit opportunities in complex derivative markets.

commodities.title: Gold, Commodities, etc.
commodities.content: AI-based automated gold and commodities trading service. AI analyzes commodity market volatility to pursue stable returns.

etf.title: Foreign ETF +
etf.content: AI-based automated foreign ETF trading service. AI analyzes various foreign ETFs and automatically executes diversification strategies.

bonds.title: Bonds & Foreign Currency
bonds.content: AI-based automated bonds and foreign currency trading service. AI analyzes opportunities in bond and foreign exchange markets to pursue stable returns.
